name: CORRUPTED (itch) (gsloan, jadeschmidt1004, CChildress, GoldGator)
description:
This was created with a team of 4 Neumont students in a 60 hour game jam. The theme was cursed and the limitation was "I can't see." We recommend playing with the lights off and headphones on for the best experience.

You crashed at the entrance of a strangely quiet town. You can't go back now. Might as well keep going.

Controls:

WASD - Move 

Shift - Crouch

 Mouse - Look around 

E - Interact / Pickup 

F - Toggle flashlight (once acquired) 

Left Click - Shoot gun (once acquired) 

R - Reload Gun (once acquired)
